title: Mum reveals clever trick for hiding chocolate from kids in frozen bags of vegetables
text:
A sneaky mum's clever trick for keeping her chocolate hidden from her kids has taken parenting Facebook groups across Australia by storm overnight.

The woman, believed to be from America, recently took to social media to share photos of her 'genius' stashing trick with friends and family.

One photo revealed a packet of frozen vegetables held closed with a freezer peg while the other showed the packet open and full of sweet treats.

'Let's see the kids find this stash,' she captioned a post which has since generated more than 2,700 reactions and has been shared more than 52,000 times.

A savvy mum has revealed how she keeps her treats hidden from her kids by stashing these inside frozen packets of vegetables

Many parents were thrilled with the idea and questioned why they'd never come up with the idea before.

'I know where I'm hiding my stash of goodies from now on!' Said one.

'I'm checking all the veggie bags when I get home,' joked a third.

A few sharing their thoughts on the thread said the trick wasn't entirely new - and had been something their mother had done.

'My mum has been doing this for ages, and hiding a whole bottle of alcohol in veggie bags too,' said one.

The woman's savvy idea has struck a chord with parents around the world who say they're stunned by its simple brilliance

Another chimed in: 'This wouldn't have worked in our family I loved my veg too much.'

One cheeky commenter said they thought the idea might work as a clever way for controlling their urge to snack.

'Can you do this to me, please. My fat a** needs to step away from the snacks,' said one.
description: A sneaky mum's clever trick for keeping her chocolate hidden from her kids has taken parenting Facebook groups across Australia by storm overnight.
authors: Emilia Mazza For Daily Mail Australia
